attributes.additional_details: It's been put all over newspapers and the news that most of our new buildings will be given to immigrants before people go on here
attributes.background: We have  loads of British people that are not being house that are in overcrowded house is private rented or sleeping on the streets it's time we get together and start putting our families first. If we pay taxes and work hard we should have the right to say what we feel

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
